channel.title: Preferences - MIDI INPUT
channel.description:
Drop down Midi input menu - you can select one entry (v marked), click OK gets saved in prefs, but if you go and select a different input the previous one is still active and has no v mark, and only one selection gets saved in prefs Is this normal/expected to have many selections?
macosx10.7.5

item.title: Preferences - MIDI INPUT
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Routing MIDI through the Axoloti editor was implemented before the Axoloti firmware exposed a (class compliant) MIDI device port. You can send MIDI from other application directly to this port, routing MIDI through the editor is no longer needed. This preference/setting is already removed in git.

Read full topic
